REUTERS.UNKNOWN: V RM f2573 reute b f BC-/-FED-ADDS-RESERVES-V 03-16 0059

TEXT.TITLE: FED ADDS RESERVES VIA THREE-DAY REPURCHASES
TEXT.BODY: The Federal Reserve entered the U.S. Government securities market to arrange three-day System repurchase agreements, a Fed spokesman said. Dealers said that Federal funds were trading at 6-1/4 pct when the Fed began its temporary and direct supply of reserves to the banking system. Reuter
